A little CAR test

  • First, read this press release and write the first 3 grafs of a story you'd do based on it. After that, give me bullet points of how you'd report out the story. http://www.nj.gov/oag/newsreleases11/pr20110607b.html

  • Second, look at this spreadsheet of NJ property tax data from the state Division of Local Government Services. Examine the numbers. Tell me what jumps out at you and why. Give me the lede of a story you'd write based on it and then give me bullet points of how you'd report it out and why. For more background on taxes overall, see this: http://www.nj.gov/dca/lgs/taxes/10_data/10taxsummary.htm

  • Third, examine this database of Medical Device Reports. Join the two tables and tell me what kind of devices caused the most deaths. Give me bullet points of what process you'd use to report this out for a story.

When you're done, e-mail me at tmeagher(at)starledger(dot)com.
